item.title: Hyperopt Basics
item.description: This is an introduction to using Hyperopt library. This library is used to choose the hyperparameters, that is the parameters of the model that is chosen to estimate the data. This is \(\R\). item.title: Borel σ-algebra
item.description: When one studies probability theory, a notion of a Borel $σ$-algebra arises. Here we will look at what this is. First thing is to understand what $σ$-algebra means. Let \(X\) be a set.
